segments.text: I notice the woman is standing by the sink, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely focused on what she's doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water overflowing from the sink, pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a big puddle, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are climbing on a stool, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unstable, and I'm worried they might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching his arm up, trying to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for him to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden outside through the open window, it looks so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos happening inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices the overflow soon before it causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And I hope the kids are careful and don't hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
